node.name: structure101
node.shortdescription:
The structure101">http://www.headwaysoftware.com/products/structure101/plugin/">structure101 plug-in for Eclipse is a free companion to the structure101">http://www.headwaysoftware.com/products/structure101/client/">structure101 client product.

The plug-in lets you influence your software architecture as it happens – when the code is edited in the IDE. Structure101 architecture">http://www.headwaysoftware.com/products/structure101/define-architecture... diagrams specify layering and composition in a concise format. The plug-in displays the diagrams within the IDE, any violations to the target architecture are shown on the diagrams, and the plug-in lets you navigate to the relevant code.

A key feature is that the plug-in can be set to warn only on *new* code changes that are inconsistent with the architecture. This way developers can grow the code-base towards the target architecture without being constantly swamped with pre-existing violations.The structure101">http://www.headwaysoftware.com/products/structure101/plugin/">structure101 plug-in for Eclipse is a free companion to the structure101">http://www.headwaysoftware.com/products/structure101/client/">structure101 client product.

The plug-in lets you influence your software architecture as it happens – when the code is edited in the IDE. Structure101 architecture">http://www.headwaysoftware.com/products/structure101/define-architecture... diagrams specify layering and composition in a concise format. The plug-in displays the diagrams within the IDE, any violations to the target architecture are shown on the diagrams, and the plug-in lets you navigate to the relevant code.

A key feature is that the plug-in can be set to warn only on *new* code changes that are inconsistent with the architecture. This way developers can grow the code-base towards the target architecture without being constantly swamped with pre-existing violations.
node.body:
The structure101">http://www.headwaysoftware.com/products/structure101/plugin/">structure101 plug-in for Eclipse is a free companion to the structure101">http://www.headwaysoftware.com/products/structure101/client/">structure101 client product.

The plug-in lets you influence your software architecture as it happens – when the code is edited in the IDE. Structure101 architecture">http://www.headwaysoftware.com/products/structure101/define-architecture... diagrams specify layering and composition in a concise format. The plug-in displays the diagrams within the IDE, any violations to the target architecture are shown on the diagrams, and the plug-in lets you navigate to the relevant code.

A key feature is that the plug-in can be set to warn only on *new* code changes that are inconsistent with the architecture. This way developers can grow the code-base towards the target architecture without being constantly swamped with pre-existing violations.The structure101">http://www.headwaysoftware.com/products/structure101/plugin/">structure101 plug-in for Eclipse is a free companion to the structure101">http://www.headwaysoftware.com/products/structure101/client/">structure101 client product.

The plug-in lets you influence your software architecture as it happens – when the code is edited in the IDE. Structure101 architecture">http://www.headwaysoftware.com/products/structure101/define-architecture... diagrams specify layering and composition in a concise format. The plug-in displays the diagrams within the IDE, any violations to the target architecture are shown on the diagrams, and the plug-in lets you navigate to the relevant code.

A key feature is that the plug-in can be set to warn only on *new* code changes that are inconsistent with the architecture. This way developers can grow the code-base towards the target architecture without being constantly swamped with pre-existing violations.
